basics.name: Alireza Havaeishamsabadi
basics.label: Machine Learning Engineer and Economist
basics.summary: A skilled Machine Learning Engineer and Economist with strong foundations in computer science and economics, pursuing innovative projects in the field of AI and machine learning.

work.name: PlaygroundRL
work.summary: Building the core product using NLP techniques at PlaygroundRL, a startup specializing in evaluating the performance and safety of LLMs.

work.name: Jane Street Capital
work.summary: Designed and trained a deep learning model for options volatility returns and applied regression techniques for modeling Indian ETF returns.
highlights: 1st place in intern ETF modeling competition

work.name: Snap Inc.
work.summary: Implemented unsupervised deep learning models for anomaly detection in Snapchat user engagement data.

work.name: Cohere
work.summary: Developed an active learning pipeline for content moderation and trained a 6B parameter model for the same.

work.name: Susquehanna International Group (SIG)
work.summary: Developed trading strategies and participated in stock options trading simulations.
highlights: Shadowed traders on global index desk

work.name: NVIDIA
work.summary: Designed a video super resolution model as part of the VideoFX SDK.

work.name: Smile Symbol
work.summary: Fine-tuned segmentation model for dental imaging.

education.institution: National Organization for Development of Exceptional Talents (Sampad)

awards.title: Iranian National Olympiad of Informatics Finalist
awards.summary: Advanced to the final round of the 2015 Iranian National Olympiad of Informatics, as a freshman.

awards.title: Cohere for AI Research Apprenticeship Candidate
